entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
